title: What is Happening With the #FacebookPurge?
description:
In the last few days, Facebook has banned many people without warning, including familiar faces like Jordan Hall and Bret Weinstein.

What is going on, and why have these people been targeted? Rebel Wisdom talks to Bret Weinstein, and also Leo Desforges, who not only had his personal page shut down but also his business accounts.
